title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Influence of manufacturing processes on various surface properties of an engineering component; scope of surface engineering in augmentation of surface properties Different processes used in surface engineering – surface coatings and surface modifications, application oriented surface engineering processes – for 3D surface, powder like substrate, internal surface, mass production; surface engineering problems related to substrate characteristics. Evaluation of engineered properties – control properties, response properties; surface geometry – characterization techniques (conventional and recent trends); coating thickness measurements – laboratory techniques and special techniques for accurate routine thickness measurements; adhesion measurement – conventional methods and recent developments; Measurement of mechanical properties of engineered surface in nano scale; Evaluation of tribological characteristics of engineered surface in macro, micro and nano scale, simulation of actual application environment in tribometer.
